sentence: Congressman Paul Gosar (R-AZ) recently shared with his constituents new photos and video of the latest surge of illegal aliens crossing the southern border in Yuma, Arizona.
author: Catherine Mortensen
title: Joe Biden’s Presidency: How It Started… How It’s Going

sentence: Can ranked-choice voting also lessen polarization and reduce the number of crazies — think Reps. Paul Gosar and Marjorie Taylor Greene — elected to office, as supporters in Alaska hope?
title: Column: Alaska just changed its election system to weed out hard-liners. Maybe other states should too

sentence: As if having to deal with the likes of Marjorie Taylor Greene, Matt Gaetz, Lauren Boebert, Madison Cawthorn, and Paul Gosar weren’t already trying enough for Americans who think sanity is a virtue, now Sarah Palin is dropping hints that she may throw her hat and hunting rifle into the congressional ring.
author: Jennifer Wood
title: Hoo, Boy! Sarah Palin Hinted That She Might Run For Congress In The Most Sarah Palin Way Possible
